img_above_text:
![Wukong Yellow 24.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/6/61/Wukong_Yellow_24.jpg)
If you see him rush forward with his claw raised back, prepare for a rapid combo of four quick slashes, followed by a stab with his claws.
img_below_text:
If possible, you can try to go Rock Solid when he jabs, otherwise he’ll quickly pull backwards and retreat before you can try to retaliate — which often leads to one if his leaping attacks.
![Wukong Yellow 27.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/3/39/Wukong_Yellow_27.jpg)

img_summary: The image depicts a combat scene from *Black Myth: Wukong*, showcasing the protagonist, Wukong, mid-battle against an enemy named "Tiger's Acolyte." Wukong is seen preparing or consuming an item, possibly to heal or buff, while the enemy leaps into the air, likely initiating an attack. The setting is a desolate, temple-like area, and the HUD displays health, abilities, and other combat-related information. The image aligns with the guide's description of the enemy's aggressive attack patterns and Wukong's defensive options.
